metadata.synopsis: This one-liner triggers just after players attack Father Carrion. He reacts to the way in which the combat was triggered - if the player destroyed his heart he is furious, because his means of resurrecting is gone. In other instances, he knows his death will not be permanent and is more confident.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Attacking Father Carrion for the first time. BGO_Main_A, 15; 43; 130

0.speaker: Mystic Carrion
0.text: You will suffer for your stupidity.
0.context: NodeContext: Combat line, seething with anger

1.speaker: Mystic Carrion
1.text: I am free of death's shackles. You will wear them for eternity.
1.context: NodeContext: Combat line, confident anger at the player

2.speaker: Mystic Carrion
2.text: Thrumbo's blood is on your hands. And yours will be on mine.

3.speaker: Mystic Carrion
3.text: Delinquent fool. Allow me to re-educate you.
